subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: J. J. Redick had 23 points and career highs of 8 assists and 7 rebounds in place of the injured Vince Carter, leading the Magic past the slumping Nuggets.
snippet: J. J. Redick had 23 points and career highs of 8 assists and 7 rebounds in place of the injured Vince Carter, leading the Magic past the slumping Nuggets.
